name: Berserk Millennium Empire Arc: Chapter of the Holy Demon War
storyline: The story covers part of the Millennium Empire Arc from the manga volumes 22 to 27.
summary:
Second video game based on the manga Berserk. It was released by Sega-Sammy in Japan for the PlayStation 2 on October 7, 2004. Sammy licensed the game to YBM-Sisa for a Korean version, which was released at the same time.

Its predecessor, Sword of the Berserk: Guts' Rage, was released on Dreamcast by ASCII in 1999. Both Berserk video games were created by the Japanese developer Yuke's.
